review_data.title: Cosy student bar with a view
review_data.content: Above you have the world-famous ETH building by semper and on beautiful days you can see the city's roofs, the lake and even the Alps! Below you'll find a nice student bar with changing monthly beers, other a bit exotic beverages and a very friendly...More

review_data.title: Lästige Tricks
review_data.content: Als ich mit einer grossen Gruppe hier war, hat das Barpersonal klamheimlich alle Depotbelegten Pitcher der Gruppe eingesammelt. Wir haben...More

review_data.title: Lohnt sich auch für Nichtstudenten
review_data.content: Nice people, lovely friendly staff, beautiful terrasse with nice view, cheap beer, open for everyonenot just students

review_data.title: Tolle Lage, günstiges Bier
review_data.content: Wenn die Sonne scheint ist diese Bar bereits am Nachmittag gut gefüllt. Die Aussicht ist wunderschön. Die Getränke gibt es...More

review_data.title: Student bar with a great terrace
review_data.content: Probably one of the best bar views in Zurich from the terrace. Cheap beer, nice selection, new guest beer every month. Can get quite noisy and crowded in the evenings. Closes at 22.00 on Fridays and doesn't open on the weekend

review_data.title: Student bar with great views
review_data.content: This is the student bar of ETH and Uni Zurich - it's open to anyone. The drinks are cheap for Zurich standards, and there's a great terrace with awesome views over the city. They serve some nibbles and sell crisps as well.

review_data.title: Immer junge Leute
review_data.content: Die ETH Zürich hat mit dem bQM eine eigene Bar für Studenten und Mitarbeiter aber auch Besucher. Es finden hier...More

review_data.title: Caffé studentesco
review_data.content: Al bQm ci si siede assieme agli studenti sia del politecnico che dell'università. Buono il caffé, ma anche la scelta...More

review_data.title: A nice University bar/club
review_data.content: The bar/club has a stage for acts and musical performers. There are also sofas and padded seats on the stage during the day. The main floor is mostly wooden tables and chairs and a few tall tables and stools near the counter. The very large...More

review_data.title: Bier zu vernünftigen Preisen
review_data.content: Die Bierauswahl ist gross, die Preise sind ok und bei schönem Wetter ist auch die Aussicht über Zürich sehr gut.
